title: Ep 72: Halloween Power Hour Part 2 ft Jake
description:
In this Episode: OUR SECOND ANNUAL HALLOWEEN POWER HOUR! Friend of the pod Jake joins us again as we read "scary" stories from "Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark," an r/NoSleep post about a mother-in-law poisoning people, and a few Two Sentence Horror Stories. Drink applejuice along with us and tell us which part scared you the most! 
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! 
https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like) 
P.O. Box 58 
Ottawa, IL 
61350 
Leave a Review!

Intro Music by: Iván 
https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1
